mapper.select:
SELECT C.MEMBER_ID, C.MEMBER_NAME, C.MEMBER_EMAIL, B.COUPON_NAME, B.COUPON_CONTENT, B.COUPON_DISCOUNT, B.COUPON_VALID_DATE FROM TBL_COUPONLIST A JOIN TBL_COUPON B ON (A.COUPON_CODE = B.COUPON_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.MEMBER_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE)
WHERE COUPON_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY COUPON_VALID_DATE OFFSET #{startRow} -1 ROWS FETCH NEXT (#{endRow} - #{startRow} + 1) ROWS ONLY

SELECT C.MEMBER_ID, C.MEMBER_NAME, C.MEMBER_EMAIL, B.COUPON_CONTENT, B.COUPON_DISCOUNT, A.REGI_DATE FROM TBL_COUPONLIST A JOIN TBL_COUPON B ON (A.COUPON_CODE = B.COUPON_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.MEMBER_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE A.COUPON_REGI_STATUS = 'Y'
AND C.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
OFFSET #{startRow} -1 ROWS FETCH NEXT (#{endRow} - #{startRow} + 1) ROWS ONLY

SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER A
WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ searchValue }
